channel.title: Design on Poco A Poco | Digital Design and Video Production in Denver, Colorado
channel.description: Recent content in Design on Poco A Poco | Digital Design and Video Production in Denver, Colorado

item.title: Digital and Print Design for Involution Studios
item.description: Involution Studios, a UX design agency working in the healthcare space, was founded in 2004 in Palo Alto, CA. I worked with Involution for two years creating marketing assets.

item.title: Digital Design for Artana
item.description: Artana is a boardgame company founded in 2011. I’ve worked for two years as Artana’s marketing graphic designer, eCommerce website administrator, video production and motion graphics guy, and on occasion, copywriter.

item.title: Interactive Infographic for MLA Companies
item.description: MLA Companies was in the midst of a website redesign, and requested I give their “VIP process” document a facelift to match the look of their new site.

item.title: Presentation Design for Dirk Knemeyer
item.description: While working with social futurist Dirk Knemeyer, I had the opportunity to design several of his presentations.

item.title: Promotional Video for Artana
item.description: A game system that’s epic in scope, The Chronicles Series is five interconnected board games that span the history of Western Civilization.
